messages.title: Leading the fight against the Conservatives’ hard Brexit
messages.content: The election on 8th June is your chance to change the disastrous hard Brexit that will hit people in the pocket across the North. You will already be hit harder in this region by Brexit than households in the South (estimated to be £500 worse off in 2017 alone). The Liberal Democrats are challenging the Conservatives on their hard Brexit plans.

messages.title: This is our chance for change
messages.content: The Conservative Party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. Theresa May is determined to pull Britain out of the single market and cut all ties with our neighbours. Labour are too weak and divided to oppose the Conservatives. Only Tim Farron’s Liberal Democrats are speaking up for you in Newcastle and we want to stop a hard Brexit. Anita will send a message to the country in the strongest way possible by voting for the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anita Lower will fight the Conservatives' hard Brexit plans that will negatively affect the North.
Anita believes that we need additional investment in health and social care.
Anita is against the unfair Conservative cuts and the privatisation of local services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Since the referendum, the Lib Dems have gained seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives.

community.content: Anita Lower - a caring and effective voice for us.

contactInformation.address: Newcastle Lib Dems, 3 Bloomsbury Court, Newcastle NE3 4LW

quotes.text: We see people as individuals, not as opposing tribes lined up against each other.

images.caption: Anita fights for fair funding in local services that support us all.
